description: Deep in the forest, an unusual building is under construction. Resembling medieval castle, a yellow information board says it is to become a 5-star hotel one day. But there is a single, tiny problem - the area it's situated in is under a strict supervision as it is in the heart of the National Park. Obviously, opposition used this topic to accuse us of neglecting the matter.

options.description: Heads must be chopped. Stop the investment!
Someone should pay for it, but don't stop the investment.
A great idea, this construction. Don't do anything!

title: Suspicious Investment
